description.value: Pass the components of the messages such as To, From, Subject, HTML and text parts, attachments, etc. Mailgun will build a MIME representation of the message and send it.
description.display_value: Pass the components of the messages such as To, From, Subject, HTML and text parts, attachments, etc. Mailgun will build a MIME representation of the message and send it.
